name: Furry Fantasy
description:
Furry Fantasy is a match3 game with live2D animations.



After a ship crush, main character lands himself on an unknown island. Get to know the kingdom, travel places and discover differect characters on your way. Your main goal is to get the Talisman of Wishes, a long lost treasure.



The gameplay consists of a mix of classic match3 and some elements of magic. There are five different magical elements in this game. Choose your next move carefully, as each of them affects you and your opponent differently.
